Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Lyudmila Poperechnaya
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome phone. I ordered it, and got discouraged because it said it was going to take a whole month to deliver. It came here in 2 weeks! When I got the phone, I was amazed because this was a huge upgrade from my old phone. There are tons of things you can do, and apps you can get. There's cable TV on this phone! The resolution is great, and the phone is loud when you get calls. Mine came with a case, that has a little trouble staying on but its pretty cool. In other words, if an iPhone is a Ferrari, your getting yourself a nice, BMW :))

Reviews.Title: THIS PHONE IS AWESOME!!! THIS IS A GREAT DEAL
Reviews.Author: Roger Keller
Reviews.Content: First off i dont know why all the negative feedback for this phone, this phone works just as fast if not faster than most android phones out there! It is superior in speed and i believe it is a quadcore processor, as soon as i recieved this phone i put my tmobile simcard in it, it picked it up right away! i dialed a number and it went right through no problems at all, now the next day i had a popup! that said invalid mmi ussd code, ok so i did some checking online and come to find out that this is pure vulnerability for someone to wipeout your simcard and it is preprogrammed into this phone! wow so is what i did is download ussdfix from google play installed it and followed the directions and it fixed the phone and removed the hack from my phone, now it works perfect no problems at all, i love this phone and is super super fast but lightahead and amazon need to check these phones before they ship them out to remove this vulnerability hack!!!!

Reviews.Title: False Advertisement. Phone is international so its uncompatible with EVERYTHING! I can't download ANY apps and the wifi sucks!
Reviews.Author: tammi
Reviews.Content: First things first, this ad does not say galaxy sIII mini but thats exactly what the sticker on the phones screen read when I opened the almost EXACT box that galaxys come in! So of coursr, I was expecting the same great quality and handy apps that I know the galaxy phones possess and the google app store have. I have 4g service through my provider yet this phone is always stalling, freezing, or just acting up. I called the samsung service center thinking this was a samsung galaxy, and they could help me with these tecnical issues and what not, that is when I was informed that the IMEI number went to some old Nokia flip phone. I kept trying to convince him that this was a galaxy SIII because it said so on my phone. He then asked me where I brought the phone from, and that's how we established that this was an international phone. Upon contacting the seller about these issues, they responded and told me to send them the phone back so they could do some upgrades, but that this was not a galaxy phone; its basically a knock-off! But why would I send my phone that I already paid for back to a company that is obviously doing something wrong, if they have to put incorrect IMEI numbers on the phone. That's like switching a cars VIN number! It took 3 weeks for me to receive this phone, so if I was i send it in for upgrades, it would take at least 8 weeks or more for me to get it back. I don't recommend this company or this phone to anyone! Be careful, they go by several different names!

Have not fully figured out all the features yet and am having a little trouble with getting Apps but that is probably because I havent been able to just sit down and explore the phone the way I want.  Once I figure everything out, I think it will be a great phone, so I'm excited and will update about anything new I learn.*****UPDATE*****This is an excellent phone! Had a hard time getting apps on it due to the whole Google and China disagreement but once i figured out a way around it this phone is amazing!  Im able to access/ download all apps.  Has same features and graphics as Samsung Galaxy S3 {compared mine with a friend who has it}.  My only problem is finding a case, the phone is too small for the Galaxy S3 but too large for the S3 Mini.

($100/mo. unlimited voice and text, limited Web - for four phones) This thing picks up signals so-so, but good enough. (I wouldn't expect it to work as well as the dual-band Wireless N adapters in our PCs.) Other than a somewhat short battery life, which may be more due to the boys' over-use than to any design flaw, this is a perfectly good Android phone for a whole lot less than the latest & greatest. It's nice not to have to hassle with unlocking or rooting the thing, too! Being a Linux Mint user I naturally gravitate to Android over Apple or Windows phones. I'm not disappointed at all with this purchase.

On the down side, the battery is sorta poor, it lasted me a full day day with my data  usage though, since i dont really browse the web and such on it , i have a computer and tablet for that. Besides, you get a second one so you should be set unless you are CONSTANTLY poking at your phone allll day. Browsing in mediocre, not the fastest but not too slow.  so anyways, all in all it does what i want it to do. Also, what i thought was an Led light next to the camera was just a black spec :| VERY DISAPPOINTING! But i'll still give it 3 stars since i really like the other features of the phone. Reviews.Content: note that i have only had the phone for three days.i dont understand why there are so many bad reviews, the phone is GREAT!!!!okay guys, youre paying less than 100 bucks for the phone, you cant set your standards too high. But this phone is actually pretty amazing. I really have fallen in love with it. its very responsive and quick to the touch. The box includes, phone, flip over case (nice quality), two batteries, standard headphones,screen cover, usb charger with base. the cord to the charger isnt long at all, so you might want to by a longer one, just for convenience. Its a standard android charger, you'll have no issue finding a nice one for a cheap price. the speakers on this phone are AMAZING. very loud and clear. the phone looks exactly like a galaxy s4, most clones have a yellowish tint to the flash located under the camera. however the flash on this phone is clear, giving it a realistic look. im going to go ahead and say, if you are trying to buy a $100.00 phone, this is it! this is coming for someone who has had many phones. from  iphones to windows to androids. this is a real favorite of mine. now i just have to wait and see how long this phone will last.

Reviews.Title: phone is sufficient for standard use
Reviews.Author: Angela Folson
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone for a friend of mine who is not very tech savvy, meaning high tech phones like mine (galaxy S4) is too high tech for him, so I ordered this phone for him because his old phone started giving him problems. I was very impressed with how fast it came. It stated that it would come in about a month and it came in less than a week.. so that was a plus. As soon as I put his SIM card in the phone it worked fine without any problems. The only downfall is that it is working on a 2G or 3G network so it was very slow downloading apps from the app store. But once they were loaded it was fine. This is not a Galaxy phone by far but it is suitable phone for anyone who is not very tech savvy and only wants to make calls and receive calls, check their facebook and text it's ideal and for the price you can't beat it. If you are looking for high tech stuff on this phone then this is not for you, but if you want a cheap phone that works sufficiently for basic needs then you would be happy with this phone. So far my friend is happy with the phone.

I had to learn a lot of things about it myself from just messing around. It's pretty sensitive to touch but once I set a lock on it I wasn't worried about it making any calls on it's own. It was easy to set up my phone with StraightTalk (my phone service). I think for the most part I like the phone, I'm really enjoying it's nice features..my only concern is that everything I download seems to be saved on the phone's internal memory, whereas I've been trying to adjust this setting so that it only saves downloads to the SD card...but I haven't been able to successfully do this.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this product or from this seller!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Krystal Yager
Reviews.Content: This phone had minor issues from the moment I took it out of the box! Initially, the signal quality was poor, calls dropped, and the in call volume was really really bad. However, those issues I was willing to deal with but it got worse! The "ear piece" that was provided broke within the first two weeks, literally fell apart. The only way to have a halfway decent conversation was while the phone was on speaker and that got increasing worse to hear or be heard. The screen froze a few times and then it became constant, I was taking the battery out 10+ times a day to restart it. The screen would go a blank white and stay that way until again, I had to take the battery out. Often, while trying to send a text the keyboard would get stuck and not even come up on the screen in it's entirety. Then it began to turn itself off, all day long! The worst part is, I contacted the seller 7 days after the 30 day magic time frame and the seller did not try and resolve the issue AT ALL. The only response I got was basically was oh well it's been more than 30 days... REALLY? What horrible business! To add insult to injury, I filed a claim with Amazon, thinking that they are such an upstanding a reputable site that they would surely help me with this issue and make things right. Well, WRONG! Amazon basically said the same thing, oh well you should have contacted the seller sooner! WOW, all I can say is I will never use Amazon again. Stick with the brand name cell phones and make sure that all issues beyond your control happen within the all important "30 day" time frame. Interesting how that poorly made piece of equipment lasted just long enough to alleviate the seller and Amazon of all responsibility...

Reviews.Title: Not what I wanted but great customer service
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: I will tell you this phone didn't have a Google Play Store to purchase apps and the keys made it difficult to text.  I don't know if they have fixed the defects or not but if you were looking for a phone that had all the capabilities of a T-mobile smart phone, this phone may not be up to par.  With that said, this company has great customer service.  The care about keeping each and every customer happy.  After I realized this phone wasn't for me, I sent it back and it took close to month to reach their warehouse (they are located in China), which caused me concern, but they went out of their way to keep me posted almost weekly and even offered an 80% refund so I could purchase another phone and an additional 20% refund once they actually received it.  Like I said, I wasn't happy with the phone because it wasn't everything I wanted, but I was extremely impressed with their customer service and how eager they were to make sure I was a happy customer!
